There must be connected with our sanitariums in various places ample facilities for the training of workers, and great 


                         -143- 

care should be taken in the selection of young people to connect with our sanitariums. We cannot afford to accept every one who is willing to come. Great injury is done to our medical institutions when we connect with them inexperienced youth, who do not understand what it means to do faithful service for God.
